main event: A youth of 8 years old observed a disc-shaped craft hovering over his property for 17 seconds on April 7, 1966 in Long Beach, California.
interesting points: The object was hovering and moving slowly, then suddenly accelerated and disappeared.
The witness described the object as a 'disc-shaped craft' with a dome on top.
The object made a sound 'like a soft siren'.
The witness estimated the angular size of the object to be one fourth the size of a match head held at arm's length.
The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the object, depicting a crescent or saucer-shaped craft with wing-like projections.
